import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

Melting native tokens means converting or "melting" them into their foundry. This changes the circulating supply and allows for new tokens to be [minted](./mint.mdx) again.

:::info
If you melt your native tokens, you can still destroy the foundry that created them.
:::

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Melt `MELT_AMOUNT` native tokens by calling the [`Wallet.melt_native_token()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.melt_native_token)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/melt.rs#L62
```

</div>

3. Await for the [`Transaction`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Transaction.md) to get confirmed by calling the
[`Wallet.waitForTransactionAcceptance()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#waitfortransactionacceptance)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/melt.rs#L65-L67
```

</div>
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Create a transaction to melt `MELT_AMOUNT` native tokens by calling the [`Wallet.meltNativeToken()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#meltnativetoken) <!-- TODO Update ref link -->
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/melt.ts#L46
```

</div>

5. Await for the [`Transaction`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Transaction.md) to get confirmed by calling the
[`Wallet.waitForTransactionAcceptance()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#waitfortransactionacceptance)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/melt.ts#L50
```

</div>
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

The following example will:

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/) and [sync it](../accounts-and-addresses/check-balance.mdx).
2. Prepare to melt `melt_amount` native tokens transaction by calling the [`Wallet.prepare_melt_native_token()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#prepare_melt_native_token)
   function and send the prepared transaction using the [`Wallet.send()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#send)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/melt.py#L29
```

</div>

3. Await for the transaction to get accepted by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#wait_for_transaction_acceptance)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/native_tokens/create.py#L52-L53
```

</div>
</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Expected Output

```plaintext
Balance before melting: 100
Transaction sent: 0x7b3b152127d3cf2921891ad1ea279ae484d559e4040a0d3ca8940c89cb64b34e
Block included: https://explorer.shimmer.network/testnet/block/0x70d34d37e9a30d19b641ac24529c2fc512f8c9169ffa3521be4b05b7fefe8933
Balance after melting: 90
```
